details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.11 XMP Package - PDF/A Identification Schema.
details.description: The property "corr" is not specified in PDF/A Identification Schema in PDF/A-1 specification.

rule.description: The property "corr" is not specified in PDF/A Identification Schema in PDF/A-1 specification.

error.message: The "corr" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema should not be used in PDF/A-1 conforming file.
